mapper.select: SELECT QNA_NO, WRITTER,TO_CHAR(WRITTEN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')as WRITTEN_DATE ,TITLE FROM qna ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(QNA_NO) DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM qna
WHERE TITLE like '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE WRITTER like '%'||#{writter}||'%'
mapper.delete: delete from QNA where QNA_NO =${qnaNo} and PASSWORD =${password}
mapper.update: update QNA set title =#{title}, CONTENTS =#{contents} where QNA_NO =#{qnaNo} and PASSWORD=#{password}
